request.title: LAN VPN Interface SVI Parcel Schema
request.description: LAN VPN Interface SVI profile parcel schema for POST request

interfaceName.description: Interface name: VLAN 1 - VLAN 4094 when present

timer.description: Timer interval for successive advertisements, in milliseconds
Timer interval for successive advertisements, in milliseconds

tcpMss.description: TCP MSS on SYN packets, in bytes

arpTimeout.description: Timeout value for dynamically learned ARP entries, <0..2678400> seconds

documentation.description: This is the documentation for POST request schema for LAN VPN Interface SVI profile parcel
documentation.details-1: variable name should be present with given format as specified in schema if optionType value is variable
documentation.details-2: variable name should not be present if optionType value is NOT variable
documentation.details-3: when option Type is global,  value should be present with given format/restrictions as specified in schema
documentation.details-4: when option Type is default, value should be present with given default value as specified in schema
